sentences.sContent: Miss Williams confiscated all our sweets.
sentences.sCn: 威廉斯老师没收了我们所有的糖果。

sentences.sContent: Many opposition supporters had their goods confiscated.
sentences.sCn: 许多反对党支持者的财产被充公了。

trans.tranOther: to officially take private property away from someone, usually as a punishment
